name: Eclectic
description:
Eclectic

This is a game about a small soldier whose mission is to fix that damn fan that stopped working again. You have to collect 4 batteries from different parts of the computer in order to get it working again.

The main feature of the game is randomly generated levels. Other than that you are able to double jump, wall jump and shoot lasers from your awesome spear.

Controls:

  • Left and Right Arrows to move
  • Space to jump
  • X to shoot
